AD.name: User Path
AD.description: Path underneath which user nodes are being created.

AD.name: Group Path
AD.description: Path underneath which group nodes are being created.

AD.name: System User Relative Path
AD.description: Path relative to the user root path underneath which system user nodes are being created. The default value is 'system'.

AD.name: Default Depth
AD.description: Number of levels that are used by default to store authorizable nodes

AD.name: Import Behavior
AD.description: Behavior for user/group related items upon XML import.

AD.name: Hash Algorithm
AD.description: Name of the algorithm used to generate the password hash.

AD.name: Hash Iterations
AD.description: Number of iterations to generate the password hash.

AD.name: Hash Salt Size
AD.description: Salt size to generate the password hash.

AD.name: Omit Admin Password
AD.description: Boolean flag to prevent the administrator account to be created with a password upon repository initialization. Please note that changing this option after the initial repository setup will have no effect.

AD.name: Autosave Support
AD.description: Configuration option to enable autosave behavior. Note: this config option is present for backwards compatibility with Jackrabbit 2.x and should only be used for broken code that doesn't properly verify the autosave behavior (see Jackrabbit API). If this option is turned on autosave will be enabled by default; otherwise autosave is not supported.

AD.name: Maximum Password Age
AD.description: Maximum age in days a password may have. Values greater 0 will implicitly enable password expiry. A value of 0 indicates unlimited password age.

AD.name: Change Password On First Login
AD.description: When enabled, forces users to change their password upon first login.

AD.name: Maximum Password History Size
AD.description: Maximum number of passwords recorded for a user after changing her password (NOTE: upper limit is 1000). When changing the password the new password must not be present in the password history. A value of 0 indicates no password history is recorded.

AD.name: Principal Cache Expiration
AD.description: Optional configuration defining the number of milliseconds until the principal cache expires (NOTE: currently only respected for principal resolution with the internal system session such as used for login). If not set or equal/lower than zero no caches are created/evaluated.

AD.name: RFC7613 Username Comparison Profile
AD.description: Enable the UsercaseMappedProfile defined in RFC7613 for username comparison.
